blocks.name: isfsupp
blocks.content: The property of a class to be a finitely supported function (in relation to a given zero). (Contributed by AV, 23-May-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm isfsupp(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wb(wbr(c0, cfsupp, c2), wa(wfun(c0), wcel(co(c0, csupp, c2), cfn))))
} = {
  brabga(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, c3, cfsupp, wa(wfun(c0), wcel(co(c0, csupp, c2), cfn)), wa(wfun(cv(hs0)), wcel(co(cv(hs0), csupp, cv(hs1)), cfn)))
  anbi12d(wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)), wfun(cv(hs0)), wcel(co(cv(hs0), csupp, cv(hs1)), cfn), wfun(c0), wcel(co(c0, csupp, c2), cfn))
  adantr(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wb(wfun(cv(hs0)), wfun(c0)))
  funeq(cv(hs0), c0)
  eleq1d(co(cv(hs0), csupp, cv(hs1)), cfn, co(c0, csupp, c2), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))
  oveq12(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1), c2, csupp)
  df-fsupp(hs0, hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wfun(c0), wcel(co(c0, csupp, c2), cfn)))
  diff.hs1.w(wa(wfun(c0), wcel(co(c0, csupp, c2), cfn)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm isfsupp(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚Üí(c0[finSupp]c2 ‚Üî(Fun(c0)‚àß(c0[supp]c2)‚àà Fin)))
} = {

  anbi12d((hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c2), Fun(hs0), (hs0[supp]hs1)‚àà Fin, Fun(c0), (c0[supp]c2)‚àà Fin)
  adantr(hs0 = c0, hs1 = c2, (Fun(hs0)‚Üî Fun(c0)))
  funeq(hs0, c0)
  eleq1d((hs0[supp]hs1), cfn, (c0[supp]c2), (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c2))

  diff.hs0.s(hs1)

  diff.hs1.c(c0)

}

blocks.content: A function with a finite domain is always finitely supported. (Contributed by AV, 25-May-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm fdmfifsupp(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cfsupp, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))
} = {
  mpbir2and(w0, wbr(c0, cfsupp, c1), wfun(c0), wcel(co(c0, csupp, c1), cfn))
  ffund(c0, c2, c3, w0)
  fdmfisuppfi(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wbr(c0, cfsupp, c1), wa(wfun(c0), wcel(co(c0, csupp, c1), cfn))), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, c4))
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(c0, universe), wfn(c0, c2), wcel(c2, cfn))
  ffnd(c0, c2, c3, w0)
  fnex(c0, c2, cfn)
  isfsupp(c0, universe, c1, c4)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fdmfifsupp(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0[finSupp]c1)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 : c2 ‚Üí c3))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà Fin)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c4)
} = {
  mpbir2and(w0, c0[finSupp]c1, Fun(c0), (c0[supp]c1)‚àà Fin)
  ffund(c0, c2, c3, w0)
  fdmfisuppfi(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, (c0[finSupp]c1 ‚Üî(Fun(c0)‚àß(c0[supp]c1)‚àà Fin)), c0 ‚àà ùïå, c1 ‚àà c4)
  syl2anc(w0, c0 ‚àà ùïå, c0[Fn]c2, c2 ‚àà Fin)
  ffnd(c0, c2, c3, w0)
  fnex(c0, c2, cfn)
  isfsupp(c0, universe, c1, c4)
}

blocks.name: suppeqfsuppbi
blocks.content: If two functions have the same support, one function is finitely supported iff the other one is finitely supported. (Contributed by AV, 30-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm suppeqfsuppbi(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wfun(c0)), wa(wcel(c2, c3), wfun(c2))), wi(wceq(co(c0, csupp, c4), co(c2, csupp, c4)), wb(wbr(c0, cfsupp, c4), wbr(c2, cfsupp, c4))))
} = {
  pm2.61i(wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wfun(c0)), wa(wcel(c2, c3), wfun(c2))), wi(wceq(co(c0, csupp, c4), co(c2, csupp, c4)), wb(wbr(c0, cfsupp, c4), wbr(c2, cfsupp, c4)))), wcel(c4, universe))
  exp31(wcel(c4, universe), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wfun(c0)), wa(wcel(c2, c3), wfun(c2))), wceq(co(c0, csupp, c4), co(c2, csupp, c4)), wb(wbr(c0, cfsupp, c4), wbr(c2, cfsupp, c4)))
  bitr4d(wa(wa(wcel(c4, universe), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wfun(c0)), wa(wcel(c2, c3), wfun(c2)))), wceq(co(c0, csupp, c4), co(c2, csupp, c4))), wbr(c0, cfsupp, c4), wbr(c2, cfsupp, c4), wcel(co(c0, csupp, c4), cfn))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c4, universe), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wfun(c0)), wa(wcel(c2, c3), wfun(c2)))), wceq(co(c0, csupp, c4), co(c2, csupp, c4)), wb(wbr(c0, cfsupp, c4), wcel(co(c0, csupp, c4), cfn)))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c4, universe), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wfun(c0)), wa(wcel(c2, c3), wfun(c2)))), wb(wbr(c0, cfsupp, c4), wcel(co(c0, csupp, c4), cfn)), wfun(c0), wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c4, universe))
  simprlr(wcel(c4, universe), wcel(c0, c1), wfun(c0), wa(wcel(c2, c3), wfun(c2)))
  simprll(wcel(c4, universe), wcel(c0, c1), wfun(c0), wa(wcel(c2, c3), wfun(c2)))
  simpl(wcel(c4, universe), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wfun(c0)), wa(wcel(c2, c3), wfun(c2))))
  funisfsupp(c0, c1, c4, universe)
  sylan9bb(wa(wcel(c4, universe), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wfun(c0)), wa(wcel(c2, c3), wfun(c2)))), wceq(co(c0, csupp, c4), co(c2, csupp, c4)), wbr(c2, cfsupp, c4), wcel(co(c0, csupp, c4), cfn), wcel(co(c2, csupp, c4), cfn))
  impcom(wcel(c4, universe), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wfun(c0)), wa(wcel(c2, c3), wfun(c2))), wb(wbr(c2, cfsupp, c4), wcel(co(c2, csupp, c4), cfn)))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wfun(c0)), wa(wcel(c2, c3), wfun(c2)), wi(wcel(c4, universe), wb(wbr(c2, cfsupp, c4), wcel(co(c2, csupp, c4), cfn))))
  ex(wa(wcel(c2, c3), wfun(c2)), wcel(c4, universe), wb(wbr(c2, cfsupp, c4), wcel(co(c2, csupp, c4), cfn)))
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wcel(c2, c3), wfun(c2)), wcel(c4, universe)), wb(wbr(c2, cfsupp, c4), wcel(co(c2, csupp, c4), cfn)), wfun(c2), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, universe))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c2, c3), wfun(c2)), wcel(c4, universe), wfun(c2))
  simpr(wcel(c2, c3), wfun(c2))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c2, c3), wfun(c2)), wcel(c4, universe), wcel(c2, c3))
  simpl(wcel(c2, c3), wfun(c2))
  simpr(wa(wcel(c2, c3), wfun(c2)), wcel(c4, universe))
  funisfsupp(c2, c3, c4, universe)
  bicomd(wceq(co(c0, csupp, c4), co(c2, csupp, c4)), wcel(co(c2, csupp, c4), cfn), wcel(co(c0, csupp, c4), cfn))
  eleq1(co(c0, csupp, c4), co(c2, csupp, c4), cfn)
  2a1d(wn(wcel(c4, universe)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wfun(c0)), wa(wcel(c2, c3), wfun(c2))), wceq(co(c0, csupp, c4), co(c2, csupp, c4)), wb(wbr(c0, cfsupp, c4), wbr(c2, cfsupp, c4)))
  pm5.21ni(wcel(c4, universe), wbr(c0, cfsupp, c4), wbr(c2, cfsupp, c4))
  brrelex2i(c0, cfsupp, c4)
  brrelex2i(c2, cfsupp, c4)
  relfsupp()
}

} = {
  pm2.61i((((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß Fun(c0))‚àß(c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß Fun(c2)))‚Üí((c0[supp]c4)=(c2[supp]c4)‚Üí(c0[finSupp]c4 ‚Üî c2[finSupp]c4))), c4 ‚àà ùïå)
  exp31(c4 ‚àà ùïå, ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß Fun(c0))‚àß(c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß Fun(c2))), (c0[supp]c4)=(c2[supp]c4), (c0[finSupp]c4 ‚Üî c2[finSupp]c4))
  bitr4d(((c4 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß Fun(c0))‚àß(c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß Fun(c2))))‚àß(c0[supp]c4)=(c2[supp]c4)), c0[finSupp]c4, c2[finSupp]c4, (c0[supp]c4)‚àà Fin)
  adantr((c4 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß Fun(c0))‚àß(c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß Fun(c2)))), (c0[supp]c4)=(c2[supp]c4), (c0[finSupp]c4 ‚Üî(c0[supp]c4)‚àà Fin))
  syl3anc((c4 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß Fun(c0))‚àß(c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß Fun(c2)))), (c0[finSupp]c4 ‚Üî(c0[supp]c4)‚àà Fin), Fun(c0), c0 ‚àà c1, c4 ‚àà ùïå)
  simprlr(c4 ‚àà ùïå, c0 ‚àà c1, Fun(c0), (c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß Fun(c2)))
  simprll(c4 ‚àà ùïå, c0 ‚àà c1, Fun(c0), (c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß Fun(c2)))
  simpl(c4 ‚àà ùïå, ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß Fun(c0))‚àß(c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß Fun(c2))))
  funisfsupp(c0, c1, c4, universe)
  sylan9bb((c4 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß Fun(c0))‚àß(c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß Fun(c2)))), (c0[supp]c4)=(c2[supp]c4), c2[finSupp]c4, (c0[supp]c4)‚àà Fin, (c2[supp]c4)‚àà Fin)
  impcom(c4 ‚àà ùïå, ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß Fun(c0))‚àß(c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß Fun(c2))), (c2[finSupp]c4 ‚Üî(c2[supp]c4)‚àà Fin))
  adantl((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß Fun(c0)), (c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß Fun(c2)), (c4 ‚àà ùïå ‚Üí(c2[finSupp]c4 ‚Üî(c2[supp]c4)‚àà Fin)))
  ex((c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß Fun(c2)), c4 ‚àà ùïå, (c2[finSupp]c4 ‚Üî(c2[supp]c4)‚àà Fin))
  syl3anc(((c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß Fun(c2))‚àß c4 ‚àà ùïå), (c2[finSupp]c4 ‚Üî(c2[supp]c4)‚àà Fin), Fun(c2), c2 ‚àà c3, c4 ‚àà ùïå)
  adantr((c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß Fun(c2)), c4 ‚àà ùïå, Fun(c2))
  simpr(c2 ‚àà c3, Fun(c2))
  adantr((c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß Fun(c2)), c4 ‚àà ùïå, c2 ‚àà c3)

blocks.name: suppssfifsupp

blocks.name: fsuppsssupp
blocks.content: If the support of a function is a subset of the support of a finitely supported function, the function is finitely supported. (Contributed by AV, 2-Jul-2019.) (Proof shortened by AV, 15-Jul-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm fsuppsssupp(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wfun(c0)), wa(wbr(c2, cfsupp, c3), wss(co(c0, csupp, c3), co(c2, csupp, c3)))), wbr(c0, cfsupp, c3))
} = {
  syl31anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wfun(c0)), wa(wbr(c2, cfsupp, c3), wss(co(c0, csupp, c3), co(c2, csupp, c3)))), wbr(c0, cfsupp, c3), wcel(c0, c1), wfun(c0), wcel(c3, universe), wa(wcel(co(c2, csupp, c3), cfn), wss(co(c0, csupp, c3), co(c2, csupp, c3))))
  simpll(wcel(c0, c1), wfun(c0), wa(wbr(c2, cfsupp, c3), wss(co(c0, csupp, c3), co(c2, csupp, c3))))
  simplr(wcel(c0, c1), wfun(c0), wa(wbr(c2, cfsupp, c3), wss(co(c0, csupp, c3), co(c2, csupp, c3))))
  ad2antrl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wfun(c0)), wbr(c2, cfsupp, c3), wss(co(c0, csupp, c3), co(c2, csupp, c3)), wcel(c3, universe))
  brrelex2i(c2, cfsupp, c3)
  relfsupp()
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wfun(c0)), wa(wbr(c2, cfsupp, c3), wss(co(c0, csupp, c3), co(c2, csupp, c3))), wa(wcel(co(c2, csupp, c3), cfn), wss(co(c0, csupp, c3), co(c2, csupp, c3))))
  anim1i(wbr(c2, cfsupp, c3), wss(co(c0, csupp, c3), co(c2, csupp, c3)), wcel(co(c2, csupp, c3), cfn))
  fsuppimpd(c2, c3, wbr(c2, cfsupp, c3))
  id(wbr(c2, cfsupp, c3))

  mpbir2and(w0, wbr(cxp(c0, csn(c1)), cfsupp, c1), wfun(cxp(c0, csn(c1))), wcel(co(cxp(c0, csn(c1)), csupp, c1), cfn))

  fnconstg(c1, c3, c0)
  fnfun(cxp(c0, csn(c1)), c0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(co(cxp(c0, csn(c1)), csupp, c1), cfn))
  eqeltri(co(cxp(c0, csn(c1)), csupp, c1), cfn, emptycls)
  fczsupp0(c0, c1)

thm fsuppunfi(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {

  com12(wcel(co(c0, csupp, c1), cfn), w0, wcel(cun(co(c0, csupp, c1), co(c2, csupp, c1)), cfn))
  3syl(w0, wi(wcel(co(c0, csupp, c1), cfn), wcel(cun(co(c0, csupp, c1), co(c2, csupp, c1)), cfn)), wbr(c2, cfsupp, c1), wa(wfun(c2), wcel(co(c2, csupp, c1), cfn)))
  fsuppimp(c2, c1)
  adantl(wfun(c2), wcel(co(c2, csupp, c1), cfn), wi(wcel(co(c0, csupp, c1), cfn), wcel(cun(co(c0, csupp, c1), co(c2, csupp, c1)), cfn)))
  expcom(wcel(co(c2, csupp, c1), cfn), wcel(co(c0, csupp, c1), cfn), wcel(cun(co(c0, csupp, c1), co(c2, csupp, c1)), cfn))
  unfi(co(c0, csupp, c1), co(c2, csupp, c1))
}

  adantr(w0, wfun(c0), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, c3)))
  jca(w0, wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, c3))

  resindm(c0, c1)
  fndmfifsupp(cres(c0, cin(c1, cdm(c0))), c2, cin(c1, cdm(c0)), c3, w0)
  syl(w0, wfn(cres(c0, cin(c1, cdm(c0))), cin(c1, cdm(c0))), wfn(c0, cdm(c0)))
  funfnd(c0, w0)
  fnresin2(c0, cdm(c0), c1)
  syl(w0, wcel(cin(c1, cdm(c0)), cfn), wcel(c1, cfn))
  infi(c1, cdm(c0))
}

blocks.name: frnfsuppbi
blocks.content: Two ways of saying that a function with known codomain is finitely supported. (Contributed by AV, 8-Jul-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm frnfsuppbi(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wi(wf(c4, c0, c5), wb(wbr(c4, cfsupp, c2), wcel(cima(ccnv(c4), cdif(c5, csn(c2))), cfn))))
} = {
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wf(c4, c0, c5), wb(wbr(c4, cfsupp, c2), wcel(cima(ccnv(c4), cdif(c5, csn(c2))), cfn)))
  bitrd(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wf(c4, c0, c5)), wbr(c4, cfsupp, c2), wcel(cima(ccnv(c4), cdif(c5, csn(c2))), cfn), wcel(co(c4, csupp, c2), cfn))
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wf(c4, c0, c5)), wb(wbr(c4, cfsupp, c2), wcel(co(c4, csupp, c2), cfn)), wfun(c4), wcel(c4, universe), wcel(c2, c3))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wf(c4, c0, c5), wfun(c4))
  ffun(c4, c0, c5)
  imp(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wf(c4, c0, c5), wcel(c4, universe))
  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wi(wf(c4, c0, c5), wcel(c4, universe)))
  expcom(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c4, c0, c5), wcel(c4, universe))
  fex(c4, c0, c5, c1)
  simplr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wf(c4, c0, c5))
  funisfsupp(c4, universe, c2, c3)
  eleq1d(co(c4, csupp, c2), cfn, cima(ccnv(c4), cdif(c5, csn(c2))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wf(c4, c0, c5)))
  imp(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wf(c4, c0, c5), wceq(co(c4, csupp, c2), cima(ccnv(c4), cdif(c5, csn(c2)))))
  frnsuppeq(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5)
}

blocks.name: fsuppmptif
blocks.content: A function mapping an argument to either a value of a finitely supported function or zero is finitely supported. (Contributed by AV, 6-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm fsuppmptif(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(cmpt(s0, c0, cif(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3, wcel(cv(s0), c1))), cfsupp, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c2, c0, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c2, cfsupp, c3))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpbir2and(w0, wbr(cmpt(s0, c0, cif(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3, wcel(cv(s0), c1))), cfsupp, c3), wfun(cmpt(s0, c0, cif(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3, wcel(cv(s0), c1)))), wcel(co(cmpt(s0, c0, cif(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3, wcel(cv(s0), c1))), csupp, c3), cfn))
  ffund(cmpt(s0, c0, cif(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3, wcel(cv(s0), c1))), c0, universe, w0)
  fmpttd(s0, c0, cif(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), universe, w0)
  sylancr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cif(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), universe), wcel(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), universe), wcel(c3, c6))
  fvex(c2, cv(s0))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c3, c6))
  ifexg(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), universe, c3, c6, wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  ssfid(co(cmpt(s0, c0, cif(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3, wcel(cv(s0), c1))), csupp, c3), co(c2, csupp, c3), w0)
  fsuppimpd(c2, c3, w0)
  suppss2(s0, c0, cif(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), c3, co(c2, csupp, c3), c5, w0)
  syl6eq(cif(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), c3, cif(c3, c3, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, co(c2, csupp, c3)))))
  ifeq1d(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3, c3, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, co(c2, csupp, c3)))), wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  suppssr(cv(s0), c0, co(c2, csupp, c3), c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, w0)
  ssidd(co(c2, csupp, c3), w0)
  ifid(c3, wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wbr(cmpt(s0, c0, cif(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3, wcel(cv(s0), c1))), cfsupp, c3), wa(wfun(cmpt(s0, c0, cif(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3, wcel(cv(s0), c1)))), wcel(co(cmpt(s0, c0, cif(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3, wcel(cv(s0), c1))), csupp, c3), cfn))), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cif(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3, wcel(cv(s0), c1))), universe), wcel(c3, c6))
  mptexd(s0, c0, cif(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), c5, w0)
  isfsupp(cmpt(s0, c0, cif(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3, wcel(cv(s0), c1))), universe, c3, c6)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c2, csupp, c3)
  diff.csupp.s(s0)
}

  syl6eq(if(s0 ‚àà c1,(c2 ` s0), c3), c3, if(s0 ‚àà c1, c3, c3), (w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà(c0 \(c2[supp]c3))))
  ifeq1d((c2 ` s0), c3, c3, (w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà(c0 \(c2[supp]c3))), s0 ‚àà c1)

  isfsupp((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ if(s0 ‚àà c1,(c2 ` s0), c3)), universe, c3, c6)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c2, csupp, c3)

blocks.name: fsuppcolem
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ fsuppco . Formula building theorem for finite supports: rearranging the index set. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 21-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fsuppcolem(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cima(ccnv(ccom(c0, c1)), cdif(universe, csn(c2))), cfn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), cdif(universe, csn(c2))), cfn))
  -| wi(w0, wf1(c1, c3, c4))
} = {
  syl5eqel(cima(ccnv(ccom(c0, c1)), cdif(universe, csn(c2))), cfn, cima(ccnv(c1), cima(ccnv(c0), cdif(universe, csn(c2)))), w0)
  eqtri(cima(ccnv(ccom(c0, c1)), cdif(universe, csn(c2))), cima(ccnv(c1), cima(ccnv(c0), cdif(universe, csn(c2)))), cima(ccom(ccnv(c1), ccnv(c0)), cdif(universe, csn(c2))))
  imaeq1i(ccnv(ccom(c0, c1)), cdif(universe, csn(c2)), ccom(ccnv(c1), ccnv(c0)))
  cnvco(c0, c1)
  imaco(ccnv(c1), ccnv(c0), cdif(universe, csn(c2)))
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(cima(ccnv(c1), cima(ccnv(c0), cdif(universe, csn(c2)))), cfn), wfun(ccnv(c1)), wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), cdif(universe, csn(c2))), cfn))
  syl(w0, wfun(ccnv(c1)), wf1(c1, c3, c4))
  simprbi(wf1(c1, c3, c4), wfun(ccnv(c1)), wf(c1, c3, c4))
  df-f1(c1, c3, c4)
  imafi(ccnv(c1), cima(ccnv(c0), cdif(universe, csn(c2))))
}

thm fsuppcolem(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(`'(c0 ‚àò c1)"(ùïå \ { c2 }))‚àà Fin)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(`' c0 "(ùïå \ { c2 }))‚àà Fin)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c1 : c3 ‚Ü£ c4))
} = {
  syl5eqel((`'(c0 ‚àò c1)"(ùïå \ { c2 })), cfn, (`' c1 "(`' c0 "(ùïå \ { c2 }))), w0)
  eqtri((`'(c0 ‚àò c1)"(ùïå \ { c2 })), (`' c1 "(`' c0 "(ùïå \ { c2 }))), ((`' c1 ‚àò `' c0)"(ùïå \ { c2 })))
  imaeq1i(`'(c0 ‚àò c1), (ùïå \ { c2 }), (`' c1 ‚àò `' c0))
  cnvco(c0, c1)
  imaco(`' c1, `' c0, (ùïå \ { c2 }))
  syl2anc(w0, (`' c1 "(`' c0 "(ùïå \ { c2 })))‚àà Fin, Fun(`' c1), (`' c0 "(ùïå \ { c2 }))‚àà Fin)
  syl(w0, Fun(`' c1), (c1 : c3 ‚Ü£ c4))
  simprbi((c1 : c3 ‚Ü£ c4), Fun(`' c1), (c1 : c3 ‚Üí c4))
  df-f1(c1, c3, c4)
  imafi(`' c1, (`' c0 "(ùïå \ { c2 })))

blocks.name: fsuppco
blocks.content: The composition of a 1-1 function with a finitely supported function is finitely supported. (Contributed by AV, 28-May-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm fsuppco(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(ccom(c0, c1), cfsupp, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c0, cfsupp, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wf1(c1, c3, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c6))
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wbr(ccom(c0, c1), cfsupp, c2), wcel(co(ccom(c0, c1), csupp, c2), cfn))
  eqeltrd(co(ccom(c0, c1), csupp, c2), cfn, cima(ccnv(ccom(c0, c1)), cdif(universe, csn(c2))), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(co(ccom(c0, c1), csupp, c2), cima(ccnv(ccom(c0, c1)), cdif(universe, csn(c2)))), wcel(ccom(c0, c1), universe), wcel(c2, c5))
  suppimacnv(ccom(c0, c1), universe, c2, c5)
  fsuppcolem(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, w0)
  eqeltrrd(cima(ccnv(c0), cdif(universe, csn(c2))), cfn, co(c0, csupp, c2), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(co(c0, csupp, c2), cima(ccnv(c0), cdif(universe, csn(c2)))), wcel(c0, c6), wcel(c2, c5))
  suppimacnv(c0, c6, c2, c5)
  fsuppimpd(c0, c2, w0)
  syl3anc(w0, wb(wbr(ccom(c0, c1), cfsupp, c2), wcel(co(ccom(c0, c1), csupp, c2), cfn)), wfun(ccom(c0, c1)), wcel(ccom(c0, c1), universe), wcel(c2, c5))
  syl2anc(w0, wfun(ccom(c0, c1)), wfun(c0), wfun(c1))
  syl(w0, wfun(c0), wbr(c0, cfsupp, c2))
  simpld(wbr(c0, cfsupp, c2), wfun(c0), wcel(co(c0, csupp, c2), cfn))
  fsuppimp(c0, c2)
  syl(w0, wfun(c1), wf1(c1, c3, c4))
  f1fun(c1, c3, c4)
  funco(c0, c1)
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(ccom(c0, c1), universe), wcel(c0, c6), wfun(ccnv(c1)))
  syl(w0, wfun(ccnv(c1)), wf1(c1, c3, c4))
  simprbi(wf1(c1, c3, c4), wfun(ccnv(c1)), wf(c1, c3, c4))
  df-f1(c1, c3, c4)
  cofunex2g(c0, c6, c1)
  funisfsupp(ccom(c0, c1), universe, c2, c5)
}

  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ‚àò c1)[finSupp]c2)

blocks.name: fsuppco2
blocks.content: The composition of a function which maps the zero to zero with a finitely supported function is finitely supported. This is not only a special case of ~ fsuppcor because it does not require that the "zero" is an element of the range of the finitely supported function. (Contributed by AV, 6-Jun-2019.)
